page.title: 08 The Rose and Crown, Chilton
page.content:
Mr.McKnight is the landlord of a pub in Chilton called the Rose and Crown. He has been in charge for 7 years. He employs 13 people;5 barmaids,4 barmen, a cook,a cleaner, a cellarman and a gardener. The best selling drink is bitter beer. His opening times are 10.30am to 2.30pm,and 6pm to 11pm.The brewery which owns the Rose and Crown is Morlands of Abingdon. Mr.McKnight also sells food.The best selling items are salad, and beefburger and chips.Over 120 drinks are on sale. The most popular night is Friday night.The biggest order he has had was for 22 pints of shandy.2 cricket teams ordered them.The owners before Mr.McKnight were the Vintons.Their family had owned the pub for 140 years.
